title.bibl: Saloniki-Greek Press, July 20, 1933. New Sorority Organized

div.bibl: Greek Press, July 20, 1933. NEW SORORITY ORGANIZED

body.p: A large group of young Greek women in the parish of the Koimisis Tis Theotokov Church have formed a new society, the Delta Kappa Theta sorority. The following officers were elected at the first meeting: Eugenia Trian, president; Christina Ivoti, vice-president;....
It was decided that the meetings should be conducted in the Greek language so that the girls might become accustomed to speaking their mother tongue.
